posts.post_title: FS. T206 Southern League Old Mill SGC
posts.post_content:
Up for sale I have 4 t206 Southern League Old Mill cards all graded by SGC. I would like you to pay with a paypal gift to [url]lisajoe97@yahoo.com[/url]. I will pay for the shipping. Thanks. Hope this fills some holes for someone. Prices are:

SGC 40 Al Orth $70.00 (Sold)
SGC 30 Ike Rockenfeld $65.00 (Sold)
SGC 30 Foley White $60.00
SGC 20 Tony Thebo $55.00 (two small creases)


Private Message me...Thanks
Joe
